item.description:
Do you want to know...?


...How to stay calm, centered and peaceful amidst the
noise, chaos and confusion of modern day living?

...Who you really are, and why you are on this earth?

...How to live your life with passion, joy, and love?
Join us as we introduce Mr. Umesh Nandwani in his first speaking engagement in the United States

This program is part of 5 day stay in Nashua. You have the opportunity to hear this international speaker as he shares the secrets of joy, health and happiness.

Umesh’s mission is to serve and inspire humanity to evolve to higher spiritual levels towards self-realization, enlightenment and to be happy, healthy and successful in life.

Initiated into various healing modalities, his qualifications include:

•Master Trainings in Meditation, Mind Power & Motivational Dynamics
•Master in Reiki Energy Healing
•Certified Stress Management Consultant (CSMC)
•Bachelor Degree in Metaphysical Science, University of Sedona (USA)
He is also a certified counsellor and member for the International Association of Counselors & Therapists.
Presently, he is pursuing a Masters in Metaphysical Science. Umesh is the Founder of The Golden Space – Center for (Non-religious & Universal) Meditation, Healing, and Life Transformation, Creator and Lead Instructor of "Awaken ~ The Divine You®" Program which he teaches in Singapore, Hong Kong, Malaysia, Indonesia, India, Nepal and Australia. Thousands of people have benefited from this life changing and results proven program.

Umesh will meet with you one on one on Friday, September 24th for a free 20 minute session.
Monday after teaching the Foundation course Umhesh will again meet one on one with students attending the program.

The Foundation Workshop
In this workshop you may experience how to:

•Transform yourself into a being of positive power by awakening your personal power source. One that is positive, self-aware, wise and compassionately connected with all humanity and Mother Earth.
•Release dysfunctional mental and emotional blocks such as fear, anxiety, sadness, loneliness, self-limitations, anger, hatred, worries, doubts, frustration, stress, low and negative energy levels.
•Empower yourself with clarity, strength and positive energy - enhancing learning ability, creativity, intuition, focus and problem-solving abilities.
•Radiate an inner calmness and be able to handle events of your life easily and without resistance. You will remain centered, vital and peaceful at all times with the ability to go with the Universal flow.
•Learn to tap into your natural self-healing abilities, promoting optimum physical, mental, emotional and spiritual well-being. You will start to attract good and right things into all areas of your life.
FREE PREVIEW SEMINAR
You have nothing to lose by attending our FREE Live Preview Seminar happening on September 23rd 2010, from 6.00 pm to 10.00 pm. Here, you will get all your questions answered. Free 20 minute one-on-one consultation with Umesh for the first 20 people who sign up!



FOUNDATION LEVEL
(Basic Level of Self-Discovery, Understanding, General Life & Tools Required for a Balanced Life)
•Who am I? Why are We on Earth this Lifetime?
•Energy Dynamics Awareness
•Connecting to Your Inner Spirit-Self Being
•Understanding Your Inner-Self & Outer-Self
•The Understanding and Application of Success in Life (removal of physical, mental & emotional blockages)
•Positive Psychology Application (complete positive empowerment covering the mind, body, soul & emotions)
•How to Make Correct Choices Consciously (overcoming ignorance, attachment & egoism)
•Apply Psychic Protections (against negativity & all forms of psychic attack)
•Learning to Self-Heal with Love, Light and Forgiveness – Part 1
•Creation of Abundance in Your Life (health, wealth, love, happiness, peace using the positive power of intents & affirmations)
•...and much more will be covered
YOUR INVESTMENT
Foundation Level: $300/person $250/person for members of The Holistic Self Care Center
for more information also see the website www.addestracenter.com

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: AWAKEN~THE DIVINE YOU® Discover How to Transform Your Life!
